meanings.definition: A small tree or shrub of the chestnut family.
meanings.sent1: The chinquapin in the backyard provides shade during hot days.
meanings.sent2: I collected some chinquapins to roast over the campfire.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel tried to climb the chinquapin tree but kept slipping down.
meanings.sent4: Her hair had a chinquapin hue, resembling the autumn leaves.
meanings.sent5: The sweet scent of the chinquapin blossoms filled the air.
